original_text: Behold, he is hid now in some pit, or in some other place: and it will come to pass, when some of them be overthrown at the first, that whosoever heareth it will say, There is a slaughter among the people that follow Absalom.
korean_text: 지금 그가 어느 굴에나 어느 곳에 숨어 있으리니 혹 무리 중에 몇이 먼저 엎드러지면 그 소문을 듣는 자가 말하기를 압살롬을 따르는 자 가운데에서 패함을 당하였다 할지라

sentences.original_text: in some pit, or in some other place:
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 구덩이 속에, 또는 다른 어떤 곳에:

sentences.original_text: and it will come to pass,
when some of them be overthrown at the first,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 몇몇이 처음에 패배할 때,

sentences.original_text: that whosoever heareth it will say,
among the people that follow Absalom.
